item.title: Alison add a quote by Angela Davis
item.description: "Radical simply means "grasping things at the root." -- Angela Davis

item.title: Alison add a quote by Gloria Steinem
item.description: "The truth will set you free, but first it will piss you off." -- Gloria Steinem

item.title: Alison add a quote by Karl Marx
item.description:
"The philosophers have only <i>interpreted</i> the world, in various ways. The point, however, is to <i>change</i> it.
[<i>These words are also inscribed upon his grave</i>]" -- Karl Marx

item.title: Alison add a quote by Jeanette Winterson
item.description: "What is it that you contain? The Dead. Time. Light patterns of millennia. The expanding universe opening in your gut. Are your twenty-three feet of intestines loaded with stars?" -- Jeanette Winterson

item.title: Alison add a quote by Molly Ivins
item.description: "There are two kinds of humor. One kind that makes us chuckle about our foibles and our shared humanity -- like what Garrison Keillor does. The other kind holds people up to public contempt and ridicule -- that's what I do. Satire is traditionally the weapon of the powerless against the powerful. I only aim at the powerful. When satire is aimed at the powerless, it is not only cruel -- it's vulgar. " -- Molly Ivins
